VARIABLES.name: y_1
VARIABLES.description: Indicates whether production line 1 is operational.

VARIABLES.name: y_2
VARIABLES.description: Indicates whether production line 2 is operational.

VARIABLES.name: y_3
VARIABLES.description: Indicates whether production line 3 is operational.

VARIABLES.name: y_4
VARIABLES.description: Indicates whether production line 4 is operational.

VARIABLES.name: x_1
VARIABLES.description: Number of hours production line 1 operates.

VARIABLES.name: x_2
VARIABLES.description: Number of hours production line 2 operates.

VARIABLES.name: x_3
VARIABLES.description: Number of hours production line 3 operates.

VARIABLES.name: x_4
VARIABLES.description: Number of hours production line 4 operates.

PARAMETERS.name: min_workers_one_line
PARAMETERS.description: Minimum workers required for one production line to be operational.

PARAMETERS.name: max_workers_three_lines
PARAMETERS.description: Maximum workers allowed on all other lines when one production line is fully staffed.

PARAMETERS.name: max_workers_three_lines_hallucination
PARAMETERS.description: Specific maximum staffing constraint for production line 3.

CONSTRAINTS.name: production_lines_operational
CONSTRAINTS.query: The production lines can only be operated or shut down at the same time.
